sentences.en: Depreciate like what submersible pump electric machinery burns out 20 O yuan.
sentences.cn: 如潜水泵电机烧坏的降价20O元.

sentences.en: Don't depreciate my efforts to help / what I have done.
sentences.cn: 不要轻视我为帮忙所付出的努力[我已做的事].

sentences.en: If properly handled and protected, wood furniture does not depreciate in value.
sentences.cn: 如果精心经销与保护, 木制家具不会价格下跌.

sentences.en: If you buy a new car, it will rapidly depreciate in value.
sentences.cn: 如果你买一部新车, 它的价值会迅速的贬值.

sentences.en: Love, this does not require commitment, and again committed, love will depreciate.
sentences.cn: 爱, 本不需要承诺, 一再地承诺, 爱情也会贬值.

sentences.en: New cars depreciate in value quickly.
New cars start to depreciate as soon as they are on the road.
sentences.cn: 新车一上路就开始贬值。

sentences.en: The car's value will depreciate by about $ 5000 in the first year.
sentences.cn: 汽车价值价在第一年将折旧约五千美元.

sentences.en: The computer value will depreciate by $ 500 in the first year.
sentences.cn: 在头一年里这台电脑会贬值500美元.

sentences.en: The house begins to depreciate from the moment it is bought.
sentences.cn: 房子从被买下的那一瞬间起价值就开始下跌.

sentences.en: The property will depreciate in value if not kept in repairs.
sentences.cn: 房产若不勤于整修则会折旧减值.

sentences.en: We must not depreciate the work she has done.
sentences.cn: 我们不要轻视她所做的工作.

sentences.en: We should not depreciate the value of justice.
sentences.cn: 我们不该低估正义的价值.

sentences.en: We should not depreciate what he has done.
sentences.cn: 我们不应该轻视他所做的事.

sentences.en: We think lower German interest rates in due course will allow European currencies to depreciate against the dollar bloc.
sentences.cn: 我们认为较低的德国利率到时候将容许欧洲货币相对于美元集团货币发生贬值。

trans.tran_en: to decrease in value or price
